languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} up its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to one side.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Корабль запускает маневровые двигатели и скользит вбок на небольшое расстояние.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The Flagship fires up its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to one side.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Корабль запускает маневровые двигатели и скользит вбок на небольшое расстояние.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} aktiviert seine Schubdüsen und gleitet etwas zur Seite.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(1 bis 3)</u> Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} up its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to one side.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} aktiviert seine Schubdüsen und gleitet eine kurze Distanz zur Seite.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: 1-3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}active{/g} ses propulseurs de manœuvre et glisse brièvement sur un côté.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} up its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to one side.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}active{/g} ses propulseurs de manœuvre et glisse brièvement sur un côté.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}启动机动推进器，侧向滑行一小段距离。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} fires up its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to one side.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}启动机动推进器，侧向滑行一小段距离。{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}{/g}
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}：随机一到三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}enciende{/g} sus impulsores de maniobra y se desliza ligeramente hacia un lado.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} up its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to one side.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} enciende sus impulsores de maniobra y se desliza ligeramente hacia un lado.{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}{/g}
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio.</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が機動用スラスターを点火し、片側に短距離スライドする。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>1～3</u>ラウンド。</indent>
languages.original_text:

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が機動用スラスターを{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}点火{/g}し、片側に短距離スライドする。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}：1-3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（ランダム）</indent>
